website_summaries.verdict: Simple design that helps you keep your putter on line during practice sessions with immediate feedback.
pros: 2-piece putting training system that can be used anywhere (indoors or outdoors)
Low-priced tool uses a lined mat so you can see whether your putting stroke is going off line during the back swing
Only properly struck putts will go up the ramp piece, giving you immediate feedback
cons: Works best for practicing very short putts instead of long putts

customer_reviews.title: Great product will make a great Christmas gift .
customer_reviews.text: I like that it can be use anywhere , and it works as advertise . I am really pleased with it . Great value!!! First time doing a review video clip .
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I began taking golf lessons, and wanted some more help with my putting, and I’m so happy that I bought this. Great quality, and super user friendly... like the alignment guides to make sure my putter has a straight path, and I’m slowly getting better with my putting skills. I’m a teacher, so I brought it to my school and my students LOVED it... going to get another one. Definitely great for all ages and anyone wanting to practice their putting.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Works well in tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: Got this pitting practice set for my dad because hes a big golfer and for $20, it was an easy gift. Turns out he already had a practice set (oops!), but to my delight he actullay prefers this one! The reason: the inclined hole allows him to practice longer putts then he would normally be able to at home. A 6 ft putt feels twice as long! He likes to use it when practicing in front of the TV, where space is limited. He loves it, and for the price im stoked.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost .
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product the training I have are good but this allows you to hit more ball when it drops you can hit another one until it's filled then you start over again it's well built at a great price !!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Greear

customer_reviews.title: Amazing golf product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad because he is obsessed with golf. He loves it and can’t stop using it!
customer_reviews.author: huskyfan

customer_reviews.title: Worthy
customer_reviews.text: Day 1 and it had me standing in front of the TV getting my reps in. Not sure I care for the delivery mat but the ramp itself is worth it. Every good miss comes back so it’s worthy to keep on putting the misses.
customer_reviews.author: irene henderson

customer_reviews.title: Instantly Like Using GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my office to take small breaks. LOVE IT. It's simple, effective and fun. I made my first, missed two (barely) then made my 4th. It's light and easy to store back in box. Good instruction. I recommend fully. Buy one for yourself or a golf buddy!
customer_reviews.author: JGman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love the GoSports Puttser training aid! Super easy set up. Use this almost every single day and even take it into the office from time to time. Has helped my putting game tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Office putting at its best
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Delivery was super quick and the perfect putting practice for office conference calls. Although my kids now want one for the backyard so I am ordering a second.
customer_reviews.author: david p list

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomnended. Definitely has helped my putting alignment and pace.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. After practicing only a couple of days, I could see the improvement in my alignment and pace. As can be seen in my first picture, I had added 2 (4 ft.) Alignment sticks. Actually, they were driveway markers from Ace Hardware. Great off season putting training system for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ed in North Carolina USA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Putting!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Puttster! I’ve long been looking for tried and true method to improve my putting and I believe I’ve found it. The kids love it as much as I do. It’s a super gift idea as well. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: David Cloninger

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. The original alignment unit was broken, but customer service was very responsive and sent replacement. I would recommend this product. 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: L B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for practicing
customer_reviews.text: The training system has been good to use. I use it around the house and to set up a course to practice. This has helped my short game out on the real course. Don't hesitate to buy this for practice!
customer_reviews.author: Sharlyn Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not the best putting trainer
customer_reviews.text: This product is described as a golf training system and I bought it for my nephew who is a novice golfer. Honestly, the website description made it seem like it returned all balls back to you, but your ball is only returned if you miss the hole. So, this is only convenient if you are a bad golfer. If you’re good and make the shot, then you have to walk over to the hole to retrieve your ball. My nephew wasn’t very impressed, I wasn’t very impressed, and I personally found it boring and a bit misleading. You can basically accomplish the same thing by putting into a glass for free.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

product_meta.title: Puttster Golf Putting Training System by GoSports | Perfect Your Short Putts with Ramp Return System| Use Indoors or Outdoors
product_meta.description: The PUTTER is a patent pending training system that is to improve your putting. The 2-part system combines an alignment guide that ensures proper aim and stoke speed with a target ramp that rewards perfect putts and returns off-line putts. Within no time, You will see improvement in both the alignment, speed and accuracy of your putts. This is a must have for golfers of all abilities looking to shave strokes off their score and can be used at the office, at home or on a green. The PUTTER also comes in a full color retail box, making it a great gift for any golfer!
feature_bullets: 2 piece training System: putter training aid simulates real on the green putts with the included putting alignment guide and patent pending putter cup ramp
Patent pending ramp technology: perfect putts go in the hole and off-line putts are returned providing instant feedback so you can practice again
Practice anywhere: learn to master your putt under pressure indoors on carpet or out on a putting Green
Improves speed and line: to improve your pace putting and consistency putting under pressure
